column6:
With Singularity Investigations' plan revealed, X-Factor faces danger from a completely unexpected source as they race against time to save the lives of every non-mutant on the planet. Part 2 (of 3).,2006,9
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | penciller:Roy Allan Martinez | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Ryan Sook | colorist:Jose Villarrubia
